meta_title: What Is an Industrial Outage? Definition & Key Concepts
meta_description: Define outage in an industrial context. Understand the difference between planned shutdowns and forced outages to improve asset availability and OEE.
title: What Is an Industrial Outage?

image_prompt: A high-angle, wide-shot photo of a clean, modern industrial power plant or manufacturing floor during a planned maintenance turnaround. Diverse technicians in high-visibility vests, hard hats, and safety glasses are consulting a tablet and looking at a large turbine or complex machinery. The lighting is bright and professional, highlighting a sophisticated, high-tech industrial environment. No text.
